export default {
	products:[
	{
		_id:'1',
		category:'pants',
		name:'Slim Pants',
		image:'/images/pant3.jpg',
		brand:'peter england',
		price:49,
		rating: 4.5,
		numReviews:10,
		countInStock:6,

	},
	{
		_id:'2',
		category:'pants',
		name:'Denim Jeans',
		image:'/images/jeans4.jpg',
		brand:'Wrangler',
		price:60,
		rating: 4.5,
		numReviews:10,
		countInStock:10,

	},
	{
		_id:'3',
		category:'jacket',
		name:'Jacket',
		image:'/images/jack1.jpg',
		brand:'nike',
		price:50,
		rating: 4.2,
		numReviews:10,
		countInStock:2,
	},
	{
		_id:'4',
		category:'shirts',
		name:'Casual Shirts',
		image:'/images/shirt2.jpg',
		brand:'Picasso',
		price:35,
		rating: 4.1,
		numReviews:10,
		countInStock:8,
	},
	{
		_id:'5',
		category:'shirts',
		name:'T-shirt ',
		image:'/images/tshirt1.jpg',
		brand:'Monte Carlo',
		price:55,
		rating: 4.5,
		numReviews:10,
		countInStock:20,		

	},
	{	
		_id:'6',
		category:'jacket',
		name:'Hoodies',
		image:'/images/hudy1.jpg',
		brand:'Woodland',
		price:89,
		rating: 4.9,
		numReviews:10,
		countInStock:1,

	},
	
	]
}
